text: Hontōni arrā wa, shinja-tachi kara sono seimei to zaisan o aganawa reta. Kare-ra no tame (no daishō) wa, rakuendearu. Kare-ra wa arrā no michi no tame ni tatakai,-goroshi, mata korosa reru. Sore wa rippō to fukuin to kuruān to o tsūjite, kare ga musuba reru shinjitsuna yakusokudearu. Dare ga arrā ijō ni, yakusoku ni chūjitsudearou ka. Dakara anata gata ga musunda keiyaku o yorokobe. Sore koso wa shijō no kōfuku no jōjudearu
